text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a RISKASSESS

name: ActTaskRiskAssessmentInstrumentCode
title: ActTaskRiskAssessmentInstrumentCode
description: A person reviews a Risk Assessment Instrument report of a given patient.
